name: usecase
description: Import Projects, Datasets, Tables, Views, lineage, queries, and statistics from BigQuery.
recipe:
source:
    type: usecase
    config:
        include_table_lineage: true
        include_usage_statistics: true
        include_tables: true
        include_views: true
        profiling:
            enabled: true
            profile_table_level_only: true
        stateful_ingestion:
            enabled: true
